Topic.Title: $5 Special Divididend before year end is coming...

Message.Msg: Who holds the majority of Yahoo's shares? Mutual Funds and other investment funds. What do those funds pay in taxes on Dividends? Zero. Do their fundholders want to pay taxes on a one time distribution? No. Will funds that can only invest in dividend paying socks start investing in Yahoo? No - one time dividends don't count. So, you can forget about the special dividend.

Message.Title: Basket---for you but its safe to say Coldone will chime in
Message.Msg: That quote above was NOT me. So that is not true. Did "you" come out in an entire week while I was being attacked constantly - uh - no you didn't. So I deduced finally that you are all one and the same. Prove to me you're not Hot. You attacked me from the time I came to this board & unfortunately there have been glitches with the msg board which were very informative to me. In regards to your solid research. I have rarely asked "you" for research. Have I? I have to laugh about your "How does a society progress when they want people mto FAIL more than succeed" I am very happy for all that profit - either way - with the market. I don't think you have seen me say otherwise. Quite frankly Hugh, this board exhausts me now. Which is I guess what "you" guys want. Whatever. I too wonder why someone would go out of their way to be mean to someone who has been nothing but kind to them. It's a mystery to me. Truly. (~~ ***As I scrolled through the messages last week, I seen a "You're Hotmodel" to what I presume is one of Coldones ID's. Not sure what "entire week" means as I recall I have given you a compliment or two which you said "you needed that". Prove to you I'm not Hot..but I AM??? I've given COUNTLESS details about myself...from Minnesota, sisters friend Eric Decker is a star NFL receiver for Denver and my former HS had a school shooting about a decade ago. It was mentioned on an ESPN interview of Eric Decker shown before Monday Night Football, about a month ago. Message board glitches should have shown I'm no one else. Its the fact people would rather believe #$%$ than truth. Who has to be ASKED to provide research...this forum is to do exactly that FREELY and as such you'd think people would be gratetful. Not sure how society equates to profit as I was speaking in generalities of the human condition with examples that can be found on this forum. Ultimately, I have no idea what you're getting at as it seems confusing. I don't walk, talk, or act like SoDumbKid and to think otherwise is embarrassing for you and insulting to me. I too grow exhausted as the few times I did swing in I seen countless obsessive posts about me...who cares if I've taken your money over the years. Its something about the $19 level that sends Coldone psycho, he did it a few years ago when it touched AH's. Still a ways away from his load the boat at $19.40, of 4.5yrs ago.

Topic.Title: Basket---for you but its safe to say Coldone will chime in

Message.Msg: Basket, I also haven't been here a week but I know I DO dole out compliments and thank you's which everyone DOES NOT do here. I agree you do get back what you put out there as it was something I seen in a sales video for Countrywide, years ago, I was bored and love real estate so did that too. You're a French lady, who wears no panties and hopefully(at least in my mind) not a lumberjack.haha We're on the same page on the treatment which is what I was getting at earlier. Oh, as for my ID, I simply do not understand Yahoo Customer Care at all! I was on last Tuesday and couldn't check my email. I then proceeded to email them everyday till Friday. On Friday, after hearing NOTHING all week I decide to talk to them online as to why I can't check my email. I thought perhaps they locked it as I had a problem with my Hotmail, the few days prior, still can't find the malware that is auto-sending stuff. They told me to contact Yahoo Abuse Team but my account was FINE. Sunday rolls around and contact them again online...same thing, they don't have the resources and my account is fine. Still didn't hear anything so wrote them privately on their FB page. I then get an email last night that it was deleted. My last post, was in regards to someone joking about the Middle East and I said it wasn't a laughing matter. They refuse to ever give me a reason so just chalk it up to whining by Coldone and his ID's. I will never use Yahoo email for anything important! Can't wait till Marissa fires that whole Customer Service staff as its horrible and not even prompt, as well as clueless giving me conflicting info. Good eye though as I only changed one digit in the name...all have had some form of HM in it so to be as honest and forthcoming as possible. I also didn't mean YOUR money specifically just Coldones...as I've stated he HATES people with profit. The ONLY time I mention it isn't to brag its to his ever forgetful ID's the truth.
